experience.title: Former Trainee Scientist at CSIR-IIP, Dehradun
experience.description: 1) Worked on experimental and dry lab models to maximize the Biofuels production from different strains of algae.2) Production of biodiesel from Used Cooking Oil using the Patented CSIR- IIP room temperature process for the same3) Increased lipid production by upto 13% by experimenting with varying optimum reaction conditions in microalgae due to nutrient stress4) Worked under highly qualified staff and learnt the patented CSIR-IIP Biofuels production method.
